医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
LncRNA ZNF593-AS为心脏病治疗带来希望文章中提出的研究深入探讨了长非编码 RNA (lncRNA) ZNF593-AS 在心脏肥大和心肌重塑中的调节作用，这些过程在心力衰竭和其他心血管疾病的进展中至关重要。该研究揭示了 ZNF593-AS 如何通过上调线粒体融合蛋白 2 (Mfn2) 的表达来发挥其抑制作用，线粒体融合蛋白 2 是一种因其在调节线粒体动力学和细胞代谢中的作用而闻名的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/LncRNA-ZNF593-AS-offers-hope-for-heart-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/LncRNA-ZNF593-AS-offers-hope-for-heart-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714d02b7-5890-496a-b2dd-7d84b77f98d5 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 00:18:41 -0400 LncRNA ZNF593-AS offers hope for heart disease treatment
探索人工智能对精准肿瘤学的影响2024 年 8 月 26 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“人工智能：精准肿瘤学的变革工具”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Exploring-AIe28099s-impact-on- precision-oncology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Exploring-AIe28099s-impact-on- precision-oncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ada4e48b-fdcd-4be9-a549-9deb95ea9baa Tue, 27 Aug 2024 23:09:57 -0400 Exploring AI’s impact on precision oncology
1.2 亿美元的捐赠促进了加州大学洛杉矶分校在免疫治疗和创新方面的努力加州大学洛杉矶分校已获得外科医生、发明家和慈善家加里·迈克尔逊 (Gary Michelson) 博士及其妻子艾莉亚 (Alya) 的 1.2 亿美元承诺，启动加州免疫学和免疫治疗研究所，这是一个创新的公私合作伙伴关系，旨在促进预防和治疗方面的突破性发现疾病并促进洛杉矶的经济增长和创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/24120-million-gift-boosts-UCLAe28099s-efforts-in-immunotherapy-and-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/24120-million-gift-boosts-UCLAe28099s-efforts-in-immunotherapy-and-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71fc922c-b701-49d7-bdc2-92f557862b5e Tue, 27 Aug 2024 23:05:00 -0400 $120 million gift boosts UCLA’s efforts in immunotherapy and innovation
母亲产前吸烟与儿童学业成绩不佳有关吸烟几乎损害身体的每个部位。但如果你在怀孕时吸烟，烟草中的有毒化学物质也会伤害你未出生的婴儿，新的研究表明，这可能会导致学校学业成绩下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Maternal-prenatal-smoking-linked-to-poor-academic-outcomes-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Maternal-prenatal-smoking-linked-to-poor-academic-outcomes-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d27280b3-1238-4683-a08b-505454be34a8 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 23:02:32 -0400 Maternal prenatal smoking linked to poor academic outcomes in children
自组装心脏刺激器可在紧急情况下纠正心律失常通过在心脏周围注射纳米颗粒溶液，临时心脏刺激器会自行组装，可以在紧急情况下借助外部电源纠正心律失常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Self-assemble-heart-stimulator-can- Correct-heart-arrhythmia-in-emergency-situations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Self-assemble-heart-stimulator-can- Correct-heart-arrhythmia-in-emergency-situations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42ae7d9b-68a3-44b5-a783-33a04aa14685 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Self-assembling heart stimulator can correct heart arrhythmia in emergency situations
亚利桑那大学护理项目获得 160 万美元支持土著学生由于美国卫生与公众服务部印第安人健康服务中心提供了 160 万美元的资助，在亚利桑那大学护理学院从事护理职业的土著学生将受益于额外的财政支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/University-of-Arizona-nursing-program-receives-2416-million-to-support-indigenous-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/University-of-Arizona-nursing-program-receives-2416-million-to-support-indigenous-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd196c1-8258-48a0-be9b-72582047482b Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:42:36 -0400 University of Arizona nursing program receives $1.6 million to support indigenous students
非洲国家联合承诺向世卫组织投资回合提供超过4500万美元14个非洲国家和许多合作伙伴前所未有地团结一致支持世界卫生组织，承诺向世界卫生组织投资回合提供超过4500万美元的资金，这是一项为期三个月的举措，旨在为该组织提供可持续的融资全球卫生架构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/African-nations-unite-to-pledge-over-2445-million-to-WHO-Investment-Round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/African-nations-unite-to-pledge-over-2445-million-to-WHO-Investment-Round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=191453ad-71d0-4e20-9c76-ff8edd5472c8 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:35:30 -0400 African nations unite to pledge over $45 million to WHO Investment Round
简单的干预措施为密苏里州精疲力尽的护士提供了缓解甚至在冠状病毒大流行之前，高职业倦怠率和人员短缺就困扰着护理行业，这主要是因为工作压力大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Simple-intervention-offers-relief-for-burned-out-nurses-in-Missouri.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Simple-intervention-offers-relief-for-burned-out-nurses-in-Missouri.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88e6e9bd-d7d9-4fb4-9b49-d1556c126d59 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:32:12 -0400 Simple intervention offers relief for burned-out nurses in Missouri
由于知识差距和疫苗不平等，医护人员对麻疹爆发毫无准备研究突显了 2022 年至 2023 年爆发期间，医护人员对 MPOX 的了解存在显着差距，强调需要更好的全球准备和公平的疫苗获取。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Healthcare-workers-unprepared-for-mpox-outbreak-due-to-knowledge-gaps-and-vaccine-inequity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Healthcare-workers-unprepared-for-mpox-outbreak-due-to-knowledge-gaps-and-vaccine-inequity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b69294b-96cf-4062-b7dd-142ed59c4974 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:29:00 -0400 Healthcare workers unprepared for mpox outbreak due to knowledge gaps and vaccine inequity
首次全面描述 SCI 运动员神经性疼痛经历随着 2024 年巴黎残奥会的临近，运动员为参加比赛而进行的大量训练和做出的牺牲成为人们关注的焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/First-compressive-description-of-neuropathic-pain-experiences-among-SCI-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/First-compressive-description-of-neuropathic-pain-experiences-among-SCI-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abc8dfe4-8b46-417b-ad8c-bb33c7342361 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:27:19 -0400 First comprehensive description of neuropathic pain experiences among SCI athletes
